text: Frank Rost (born 30 June 1973) is a retired German football player. His last club was the American soccer club New York Red Bulls. His former clubs were Werder Bremen, Schalke 04 and Hamburger SV. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goalss Apps Goals Werder Bremen 1995–96 Bundesliga 15 0 2 0 4 0 – – 21 0 1996–97 0 0 0 0 – – 1 0 1 0 1997–98 2 0 0 0 – – – – 2 0 1998–99 28 0 6 0 3 0 8 0 45 0 1999–00 34 0 5 0 9 0 2 0 50 0 2000–01 34 0 2 0 6 0 – – 42 0 2001–02 34 1 2 0 – – 2 0 38 1 Total 147 1 17 0 22 0 13 0 199 1 Schalke 04 2002–03 Bundesliga 33 0 3 0 6 0 2 0 44 0 2003–04 27 0 2 0 4 0 6 0 39 0 2004–05 31 0 5 0 8 0 6 0 50 0 2005–06 32 0 2 0 14 0 2 0 50 0 2006–07 7 0 2 0 2 0 2 0 13 0 Total 130 0 14 0 34 0 18 0 196 0 Hamburger SV 2006–07 Bundesliga 17 0 0 0 – – – – 17 0 2007–08 34 0 4 0 12 0 2 0 52 0 2008–09 34 0 5 0 14 0 – – 53 0 2009–10 34 0 2 0 14 0 – – 50 0 2010–11 30 0 1 0 – – – – 31 0 Total 149 0 12 0 40 0 2 0 203 0 New York Red Bulls 2011 Major League Soccer 11 0 0 0 – – 3 0 14 0 Career total 437 1 43 0 96 0 36 0 612 1 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Germany 2002 1 0 2003 3 0 Total 4 0 ==Honours== Werder Bremen * Bundesliga: runner up 1994–95 * DFB-Pokal: 1993–94, 1998–99; runner-up 1999–2000 * DFB-Ligapokal: runner-up 1999 * UEFA Intertoto Cup: 1998 Schalke 04 * Bundesliga: runner up 2004–05 * DFB-Pokal: runner-up 2004–05 * DFB-Ligapokal: 2005; runner-up 2002 *UEFA Intertoto Cup: 2003, 2004 Hamburger SV * Emirates Cup: 2008, 2011 ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:German association football goalkeepers Category:People from Chemnitz Category:Sportspeople from Saxony
